title: Curriculum Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Mnemonic Techniques for Medication Therapy Evaluation

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately recall and explain five key parameters required for medication therapy evaluation using mnemonic devices with over 80% accuracy
Learners can complete appropriate medication therapy evaluation steps for given patient scenarios by applying mnemonic techniques with over 70% proficiency
Learners demonstrate a 15% or greater improvement in critical thinking scores when analyzing patient cases after using mnemonic devices

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
